translations.en: Lily is a good friend of mine.
She's full of energy and always smiling.
She did well at university, and she's good at everything she tries.
I don't even understand all of what she does.

And I don't want to make this story too complicated.
Let's just say...
Let's just say she puts shapes into their slots.
Like that, yeah. She's very good at it.
And of course, she found a perfect job for her.
Every day she goes to work. She has a lot to do.
Her work is perfect.
So naturally her bosses give her even more work.
Okay sometimes she makes some mistakes, but that's normal.
And it drives her to do even better the next day.
She's proud of her work.
And the very next day, she's back working again.
Humm... I don't know what she's doing right now.
Apply yourself next time.
Apparently she's going through a difficult period.
But she'll get back on her feet.
Ha, see. Perfect, I told you so.
The incident now behind her, she gets back to work.
What the hell are you doing now?

"I've had enough. I'm out of here," she said.
And she left.

She had a permanent contract, an apartment, her dream job.
And yet... she wasn't happy.
Lily decided to take responsability for her own happiness.
She had the courage to sacrifice everything to change her life.
And I'd like to tell her how glad I am for her.
So, congratulations, Lily!
